testCases.label: Verify get_string_length returns correct length
testCases.description: Checks that get_string_length returns the correct length for various string inputs, including empty strings.

testCases.label: Verify get_character_at_index returns character at index
testCases.description: Ensures get_character_at_index returns the character at the specified index for multiple input strings.

testCases.label: Verify get_index_given_character finds index or returns -1
testCases.description: Validates that get_index_given_character returns the index of a character if present, or -1 if not found or invalid.

testCases.label: Verify string_slicing extracts correct substring
testCases.description: Checks that string_slicing returns the correct substring based on given start and end indices, including out-of-range scenarios.

testCases.label: Verify concatenate_strings joins two strings with a space
testCases.description: Ensures concatenate_strings correctly joins two input strings separated by a space.

testCases.label: Verify repeat_string repeats string n times
testCases.description: Confirms repeat_string returns the input string repeated the requested number of times.

testCases.label: Verify string_length returns correct length
testCases.description: Ensures string_length correctly calculates the length of various input strings.

testCases.label: Verify convert_to_uppercase capitalizes string
testCases.description: Checks that convert_to_uppercase converts all letters in the input string to uppercase.

testCases.label: Verify convert_to_lowercase lowercases string
testCases.description: Ensures convert_to_lowercase converts all letters in the input string to lowercase.
